charges.charge_disposition: Forty-six (46) months imprisonment; five (5) year term of supervised release with standard and special conditions; Restitution $66,025.04; Mandatory special assessment $100.00. AMENDED JUDGMENT 5/14/2010 to add additional victim and amend total amount of restitution to $67,781.46. SECOND AMENDED JUDGMENT ON 10/15/2012: To grant Motion by Defendant to Reform Amended Judgment; Forty six (46) months imprisonment to be served concurrently with any sentences imposed in Case No. 20094244787 in Lubbock County, Texas; Case No. 14414 in Llano County, Texas; and Case No. F-09-0257-JP in Lamb County, Texas; JUDGMENT REVOKING SUPERVISED RELEASE ON 10/24/2014: Twelve (12) months term imprisonment in BOP; forty-eight (48) months term supervised release with standard and special conditions; Restitution $65,787.88; JUDGMENT REVOKING SUPERVISED RELEASE ON 07/21/2017: Eighteen Months (18)BOP Imprisonment to run consecutive with any sentences imposed in Case Nos. 2017-412,393 and 2017-412,394 pending in the 37th District Court of Lubbock County with no additional term of supervised release.
Oral motion dismissing by government; Oral Order granting
